home.title: Hi! I'm Asha
home.description:
Hey there ðŸ™‹ Thank you for stopping by.

I'm a newbie maker and a recruiter by profession. 

I enjoy learning about new trends in the market and software products that offer simple solutions to everyday problems. My current interest revolves around software project management, product life cycle, product branding, strategy, marketing and monetization.

You would read some raw, real time experiences of my journey on this blog. 

I hope to keep you entertained and be informative at the same time.
